entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. My name is VeloBot. How can I help you today?
Finally! I've been on hold forever. I need to return a VeloBand Pulse. It's completely useless!
Thank you for calling, I understand you want to return your VeloBand Pulse. I'm happy to help with that. Can I get your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
It's under john.doe@email.com. And hurry up, I don't have all day.
Okay, I've located your order. I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on October 26th. Today is November 10th. Can you tell me why you'd like to return it?

It's just…garbage. The heart rate monitor is wildly inaccurate, the sleep tracking is a joke, and it keeps disconnecting from my phone. It's supposed to be a smart watch that works, not a brick on my wrist!

I understand your frustration with the VeloBand Pulse. I apologize it hasn't met your expectations. According to our return policy, you have 90 days to return items for a full refund. Let me process that return for you.
Ninety days? Really? I thought I read something about a shorter return window somewhere. I only got it 15 days ago, figured I was stuck with it.

Yes, our standard return policy is 90 days. There may be some exceptions for certain products, but your VeloBand Pulse is covered under the standard policy. I'm initiating the return now. You'll receive a prepaid shipping label via email within 24 hours. Just pack the VeloBand Pulse in its original packaging, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized carrier location.
Okay, that sounds good. So, I just print the label, box it up, and send it back? And I'll get a full refund?
That's correct. Once we receive the returned VeloBand Pulse, we'll process your refund. You should see it reflected in your account within 7-10 business days.
Wow, okay. That's…actually great. I was expecting a huge hassle. So, there's no question about the 10 days I heard about? I thought that return policy was strict.
No, the 10-day window does not apply in this case, for this type of device. You are well within our standard 90 days. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thank you so much for your help! You've made my day way better.
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business. Have a great day!
